item.title: VoX
item.description: Race! VoX is a unique VR arcade game where you’ll try to out best yourself and your friends. Collect coins, drift and stay on track! If you worked with VR, guess you could spot the challenge here: How do you handle motion sickness and racing in VR? It’s hard, but doable. Wrapping google anti motion sickness SDK with unity scripts while also improving on that SDK proved to be a viable solution.

item.title: Bow & Arrow
item.description: “Hear ye! Hear ye! The king is looking for the best archer in the land! Are you up for a challenge of Bow & Arrow? This was so much fun to make and one of my first experiences with VR. The game feels intuitive to play and player skill increases in a steep curve.
